content.description: An empty container with volume \(0.02\ \text{m}^3\) is placed on a scale, which then reads <math alttext="10 newtons" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>. An unknown liquid is then poured into the container until the container is completely full. The new reading on the scale is  \(170\text{ N}\).
content.question: Which of the following is most nearly the density <math alttext="rho" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>ρ</mi></mstyle></math> of the unknown liquid?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho equals 1 kilogram per cubic meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>ρ</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>800</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <msup> <mtext>kg/m</mtext> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="rho equals 2 kilograms per cubic meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>ρ</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>850</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <msup> <mtext>kg/m</mtext> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="rho equals 10 kilograms per cubic meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>ρ</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>8000</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <msup> <mtext>kg/m</mtext> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="rho equals 20 kilograms per cubic meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>ρ</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>8500</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <msup> <mtext>kg/m</mtext> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="rho equals 1 kilogram per cubic meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>ρ</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>800</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <msup> <mtext>kg/m</mtext> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
